title: Hint
text: Use Newton's second law $$(F=ma)$$ to find the upward force the high jumper must exert. Consider the gravitational force and the desired acceleration.

title: Steps
text: Step 1: Apply Newton's second law $$(F=ma)$$ to find the required upward force considering the given acceleration and the jumper's mass. Step 2: Clearly show all calculations and units.
